parameters.name: payment_method
parameters.description: The payment method for payment and cost deduction when delivery

parameters.name: binding_id
parameters.description: If your usage scenario is to be delivered independently based on the size of the order or based on the actual logistics situation, you need to fill in binding_number

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order

parameters.name: sms_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package when using mass tools on first package delivery

parameters.name: tracking_number
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if the error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error detail if the error. Empty if no error

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for api call request

response_fields.name: order_id
response_fields.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order

response_fields.name: sms_id
response_fields.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package when delivered

response_fields.name: tracking_number
response_fields.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package

response_fields.name: fail_error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if the request fail or error
